title.@value: Fetus or newborn affected by amniocentesis

definition.@value: Amniocentesis involves extracting a small sample of amniotic fluid surrounding the fetus. Risks include miscarriage or injury if the needle comes into contact with the fetus or placenta.

label.@value: Fetus or newborn affected by amniocentesis
Fetus or newborn affected by trauma from amniocentesis
